div.p: >> Bill: THANKS FOR STAYING
WITH US, I'M BILL O'REILLY.
TONIGHT, 9 STUDENTS HAVE SUSPENDED FROM SCHOOL FOR

REACTING. HERE NOW ATTORNEYS AND FOX
NEWS ANALYST KIMBERLY GUILFOYLE AND LIS WIEHL.
TELL ME WHAT YOU THINK OF THEM.

SCHOOL. SCHOOL CLAIMS THAT HE HELD

>> POP TART. JOSH SAID BANG.
>> HE BIT IT IN A COUPLE PIECES THAT MIGHT HAVE
RESEMBLED. >> WANTED TO MAKE IT LOOK
LIKE A MOUNTAIN. >> POP TART.
>> SUSPENDED FOR TWO DAYS THAT'S INSANE.
>> ABSOLUTELY INSANE NAOMI MCKINNEY.
IN SUMTER SOUTH CAROLINA THERE IS NAOMI SHE TOOK AIR

AIR GUN CLUBS. THIS IS A BIG THING THAT

>> LOOKS LIKE A GUN. THAT'S THEIR ONLY

EVEN IF IT'S EXPULSION FOR A DAY OR TWO.
